data.title: How many love affairs did Karan Singh Grover had before Bipasha
data.text:
-adorethelife

Weâ€™ve heard about the Queen of controversies, but if there was a King of affairs, it could be none other than Karan Singh Grover.

Currently he is married to Bipasha Basu but there was a time when he was drowningÂ into the ocean of affairs ohh and do not forget the couple of divorces.

-BollywoodBubble

According to reports, when Karan Singh Grover was married to Jennifer Winget, he had an affair with Surbhi Jyoti, his co-star from â€˜Qubool Haiâ€™. Their proximity on the sets was palpable and it could be seen on and off screen. However, when the media was abuzz with reports of their closeness, Surbhi denied it and even Karan maintained a distance from her.

-BollywoodBubble

While Karan was married to Shraddha, he was dating Nicole. Interestingly, at the same time he was also seeing Jennifer Winget who was then his co-star in â€˜Dill Mill Gayyeâ€™. Although these two kept their affair a secret and stuck to the usual â€˜just friendsâ€™ answer, they later settled into marital bliss. But their happiness didnâ€™t last long as the duo parted ways and all the love went down in vain. The two filed for divorce. Rumour has it that once again, Karanâ€™s infidelity was the reason behind their split

-BollywoodBubble

Karan met Nicole Alvares on a dance reality show â€˜Jhalak Dikhhla Jaaâ€™. Alvares was Singhâ€™s choreographer. Gossip mongers even had it that the budding friendship between the two could have been a strong reason for his split with Nigam. However, the duo parted ways, reason being Karanâ€™s way too busy work schedule.

-BollywoodBubble

TV actress Shraddha Nigam and Karan Singh Grover met and fell in love with each other and tied the knot on December 2, 2008 in an ceremony in Goa. However, things did not work out between them and they parted ways within 10 months. Reports suggested that Karanâ€™s extra-marital affair was the reason behind the split.
